description: Microsoft has resumed the rollout of the June Windows 11 KB5039302 update, now blocking the update only for those using virtualization software. [...]
title: Microsoft resumes rollout of Windows 11 KB5039302 update for most users

description: Hackers are exploiting a critical vulnerability that affects all D-Link DIR-859 WiFi routers to collect account information from the device, including passwords. [...]
title: Hackers exploit critical D-Link DIR-859 router flaw to steal passwords

description: The new Brain Cipher ransomware operation has begun targeting organizations worldwide, gaining media attention for a recent attack on Indonesia's temporary National Data Center. [...]
title: Meet Brain Cipher — The new ransomware behind Indonesia's data center attack
